subject: Re: [PATCH v4 30/31] mm: memcontrol: eliminate the problem of dying memory cgroup for LRU folios

reviews.author: Qi Zheng (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Qi Zheng pointed out a potential issue where LRU folios might be reparented before their corresponding objcgs, leading to lock contention.

reviews.author: Shakeel Butt
reviews.summary: Shakeel Butt raised concerns about acquiring locks for all nodes together in the patch to eliminate dying memory cgroup for LRU folios, suggesting a per-node refactor and removal of try_charge.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: The reviewer raised a concern that the patch might break lockdep on more than 4 NUMA nodes due to acquiring two locks per node.

reviews.author: Harry Yoo
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Harry Yoo, pointed out a potential issue in the patch and suggested changing the type of nr_pages parameter in mem_cgroup_update_lru_size() from int to long.
